TOCEntry.title: The Oathkeeper Problem
TOCEntry.desc: Lady Geist discovers that the ward keeping a malevolent spirit known as Oathkeeper bound to her is weakening.

TOCEntry.title: Party Planning
TOCEntry.desc: Geist meets with Professor Dynamo to host a symposium on wards.

TOCEntry.title: Understanding Oathkeeper
TOCEntry.desc: Geist meets with Johann to discuss Oathkeeper.

TOCEntry.title: The Gala
TOCEntry.desc: Geist Has An Encounter With Someone Who Can Help Her

TOCEntry.title: Hunger Strike
TOCEntry.desc: Geist threatens Oathkeeper in order to get him to agree to finding a new host.

TOCEntry.title: A New Deal
TOCEntry.desc: Geist dreams of the day she made her original deal with Oathkeeper.

TOCEntry.title: Decisions Decisions
TOCEntry.desc: Geist considers her options in pawning off Oathkeeper.

TOCEntry.title: Tea Time
TOCEntry.desc: Geist reveals to Johann the lengths she will go to in order to ensure her survival.

TOCEntry.title: Paying Off The Tab
TOCEntry.desc: Geist tries to work off 50 years of life that she hadn't paid Oathkeeper for.

TOCEntry.title: A New Ward
TOCEntry.desc: Geist's Ward Revieves An Upgrade Courtesy Of McGinnis

TOCEntry.title: The Binding Of Two
TOCEntry.desc: Geist And Abrams Ask The Patrons To Bind Oathkeeper To The Tome

TOCEntry.title: Deal WIth The Devil
TOCEntry.desc: Geist tries to make Maximilian Fairfax an irresistable offer.

BookChoice.prompt: Ignore The Words of Shelly Fisher
Consider The Words of Shelly Fisher

TOCEntry.title: All Good Things
TOCEntry.desc: Geist makes peace with Oathkeeper and herself.
